channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: Hiker Rescue; INC#1142; 03:57PM; 8406 La Tuna Canyon Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3qRsvpN; #ShadowHills; Two females were hiking with the three dogs in a remote area of La Tuna Canyon, when sadly, one of the beloved pets experienced a medical emergency and passed away. Firefighters hiked in to assist the small group. Due to the timing of the situation, exhaustion was growing and daylight was dwindling, so firefighters on the ground called for LAFD Air Operations to hoist the two hikers and two remaining pets from the remote location, then firefighters hiked back out with the deceased pet, which was returned to the owner. No injuries. Nothing further. ; FS 77; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 E289 E77 E90 H4 H7 HA4 HA7 PB74 RA874 T89; CH8; 18; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire - Now Out; INC#1234; 04:55PM; 14920 W Raymer St; MAP: https://bit.ly/444N801; #VanNuys; Firefighters responded to a department store with a small fire inside, held in check by sprinklers. Firefighters extinguished the remaining flames, and are now working to shut off the sprinkler flow and evacuate smoke from the structure. No reported injuries. Firefighters continue to search the structure for any remaining customers or employees to ensure there are no medical needs.; FS 81; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC10 CM40 CM42 E239 E290 E39 E7 E88 E90 EM14 RA7 RA88 RA90 T39 T90; CH9; 17; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0847; 01:24PM; 18830 W Bryant St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3CzlPz7; #Northridge; Firefighters quickly deployed hose lines to get water on the RV and tree fires, and successfully prevented flames from entering the nearby commercial building. It took 18 firefighters 18 minutes to extinguish the flames. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 103; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC15 E103 E273 E287 E293 E70 RA70 RA896 T73 T87 T93; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0847; 01:06PM; 18830 W Bryant St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3CzlPz7; #Northridge; RV on fire, flames spreading to nearby trees, and exposing a commercial structure to flames. Offensive mode.; FS 103; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC15 E103 E273 E287 E293 E70 RA70 RA896 T73 T87 T93; CH9; 17; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1478; 07:27PM; 2311 E 1st St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3NewCDH; #BoyleHeights; It took 22 firefighters 12 minutes to access, confine, and extinguish flames in one first-floor unit of a two-story garden-style apartment. Firefighters spared the adjacent units from damage, with no reported injuries. The cause is under investigation.; FS 2; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 E15 E2 E209 E25 RA25 T9; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1478; 07:15PM; 2311 E 1st St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3NewCDH; #BoyleHeights; Two-story garden-style apartment with fire showing from the rear. Offensive mode.; FS 2; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC11 E15 E2 E209 RA25 T9; CH9; 12; Nicholas Prange

CONTAINED Brush Fire; INC#1337; 06:38PM; 1381 N Broadway; MAP: https://bit.ly/3bKIV96; #ElysianPark; *Updated Address* After 43 minutes, firefighters by ground and air stopped all forward progress of the two-acre fire. LAFD Fire investigators are responding to attempt to determine the cause. No reported injuries. Crews will remain on scene to fortify the perimeter and extinguish hot spots within the burn footprint.; FS 1; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 1; AR1 BC1 BC11 BC2 CM20 CM22 E1 E10 E16 E2 E20 E201 E202 E212 E290 E3 E44 E47 E6 E90 EM1 H2 H3 H5 H7 HA2 HA3 HA5 HA7 RA1 T1 T12 T2 T90; CH5; 15; Nicholas Prange

Brush Fire; INC#1337; 05:55PM; 550 N Park Row Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/2QMhogg; #ElysianPark; Approximately two acres of grass and brush on fire (slow-moving), adjacent to the harbor freeway. Ground crews are establishing hose lines around the perimeter, while air units make water drops.; FS 1; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC1 BC2 E1 E16 E201 E202 E212 E290 E44 E47 E90 EM1 H2 H3 H5 H7 HA2 HA3 HA5 HA7 T1 T12 T2 T90; CH5; 15; Nicholas Prange

Fatal Traffic Collision; INC#1710; 11:43PM; SB Harbor Fwy x Slauson Ave Onramp; MAP: https://bit.ly/4458vhC; #VermontSlauson; PRELIM: Traffic collision with one vehicle overturned and fully ablaze on LAFD arrival. As many as four persons are believed deceased within the still smoldering wreckage. No further details. Media Inquiries: CHP Central L.A. (Log #3096) and Coroner.; FS 33; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; AR1 BC13 E15 E221 E266 E33 E46 E57 E66 EM13 HR3 RA257 RA33 RA46 T21 T66; CH7; 16; Brian Humphrey

title.a: #CrockerFire - Knockdown - Greater Alarm Structure Fire 06/15/2023 INC#1570

item.description: #CrockerFire - Knockdown - Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#1570; 10:55PM; 832 S San Pedro St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3pcASvt; #Downtown; *Address Remains Tentative*. 117 LAFD Firefighters took 74 minutes in relentless defensive firefighting operations, to extinguish the bulk of flames in as many as three units within a 150' x 100' one-story row of (yet identified) commercial businesses with dense interior storage, including textiles. No injuries reported. Firefighters will remain at scene overnight to coordinate salvage and overhaul a large amount of smoldering debris, with LAFD Heavy Equipment (Loader/Excavator) summoned to assist in the effort, due to the physical instability of the structure. Fire cause under active investigation.; FS 9; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; AR1 BC1 BC10 BC11 BC13 BC5 BC9 CM20 CM22 E10 E14 E17 E203 E209 E21 E210 E211 E227 E229 E3 E4 E9 EA1 EM1 HE1 HR3 RA10 RA17 RA209 RA27 RA3 RA804 RA809 RS3 SQ21 T10 T11 T27 T29 T3 T9 UR27 UR88; CH9; 12 13; Brian Humphrey
